page.title: 10HOME LIFE
page.content: One Saturday I got up at about 1100 hrs.I went downstairs,washed my hands and face then my mum made me a drink and some frosties. By then it was 1200 hrs and I got dressed quickly.A friend called for me, we then got all our friends and asked them to have a game of cricket at the park. They agreed so we got all our stuff and went. We started to play at about 1300 hrs. We had about 1\hrs of play then we finished and went home for tea.Another friend called for me and we decided to play golf.I asked my brother to go. We went round in the car arriving at 1830 hrs. We played for 2 hrs because we like it.When we got home I dived in the bath for half an hour. It was 2100 hrs, I got changed into my sleeping clothes and went to bed thinking about what to do tomorrow.By{J.Frodsham}11yr
